source_id: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_036_chunk1

source_id: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_036_chunk1
evidence_span: It was concluded that the corrosion mechanism of zirconium-based alloys is a barrier-layer controlled process.
